title: Is anything being done about boosters? I today alone played against 4 boosters today
body:
4 diffent accounts, 70%+ winrate in gold with plat mmr, after being silver for 2+ seasons until this season. All playing champs (duo aswell with other accounts that have the same) that they didnt play or had a good winate with the previous season.

Unless these players started playing with their hands instead of their feet they are clearly boosting/account sharing.
Is anything being done about boosters? Cause i report these people, send in tickets but nothing seems to be done.
